selectAsLibs.sql: select * from ( select 0 as id, ''::varchar(20) as kood, ''::varchar(254) as nimetus union select id, trim(kood)::varchar(20) as kood, trim(nimetus)::varchar(254) as nimetus from cur_tunnus ) qry order by kood

select.sql: select l.*, $2::integer as userid, 'TUNNUS' as doc_type_id from libs.library l where l.library = 'TUNNUS' and l.id = $1
select.sqlAsNew: select $1::integer as id , $2::integer as userid, 'TUNNUS' as doc_type_id, null::text as kood, null::integer as rekvid, null::text as nimetus, 'TUNNUS'::varchar(20) as library, null::text as muud, null::text as properties

deleteDoc.sql: select error_code, result, error_message from libs.sp_delete_library($1::integer, $2::integer)

grid.sql: select l.*, $2::integer as userId from cur_tunnus l where (l.rekvId = $1 or l.rekvid is null)
